rows.title: In and out

transcript.eng:
Close your eyes.

Listen to your breath as it goes in and out five times.

Notice how you feel.

When you are ready, open your eyes again. You are in control!

rows.transcript:
Close your eyes.

Listen to your breath as it goes in and out five times.

Notice how you feel.

When you are ready, open your eyes again. You are in control!

text_1.eng: Self-care is a key parenting tool. It starts with recognising how we feel.

quiz_1_feedback_1.eng: Great. And amazing that you are using this app – it shows your commitment as a parent. Make sure you give yourself credit and praise for what you are doing.

quiz_1_feedback_2.eng: Every day has its highs and lows. Praise yourself for being here and trying – you are moving forward.

quiz_1_feedback_3.eng: Sorry that things are difficult right now. Take a deep breath and know that you are valued.

text_1_facilitator.eng:
Today's topic is about taking care of yourself 

We often don’t look after ourselves enough. But this is so important, especially as a parent!

Reducing our stress and treating ourselves well helps us AND our teenagers.

media_title.eng: How will it help me and my family?

media_transcript.eng:
Greetings, everyone.

Today's topic is self-care.

There are times when we experience challenges, face problems and do not know what to do. It is important to take care of ourselves to learn the techniques for keeping ourselves calm, in case problems, challenges or issues come up.

When we are calm we are in a good state to think positively and come up with positive solutions to any challenges we may be facing.

rows.media_title: How will it help me and my family?
rows.media_transcript:
Greetings, everyone.

Today's topic is self-care.

There are times when we experience challenges, face problems and do not know what to do. It is important to take care of ourselves to learn the techniques for keeping ourselves calm, in case problems, challenges or issues come up.

When we are calm we are in a good state to think positively and come up with positive solutions to any challenges we may be facing.

text_1_facilitator.eng:
Why self-care?

We often don’t look after ourselves enough. But this is so important, especially as a parent!

Reducing our stress and treating ourselves well helps us AND our teenagers.

media_title.eng:
Hear a caregiver's testimonial

Placeholder text - Anna - we need a title similar to the above

media_transcript.eng:
For me as a parent, it was almost impossible to find time for myself. I was always busy taking care of everyone else. Through ParentApp, I realised how important it is to take care of myself. It helps me AND my family!

Having a moment for myself helps me to breathe and notice how I feel. Even 5 minutes to have a cup of tea makes a big difference. Now I can deal with my stress better.

text_1_facilitator.eng:
Take a moment to praise yourself.

We will now show you how.

quiz_1_question.eng:
Think of one thing YOU have done well recently.

"Well done to me for..."

quiz_1_feedback_1.eng:
Say it aloud if you can.

Here is one thing you deserve praise for: Well done for using ParentApp!

quiz_1_option_2_text.eng: Getting up even though I felt tired

text_1_facilitator.eng: Here are this week’s takeaway skills!

section_1_text.eng: Do a 30 second quick relaxation activity.

section_3_text.eng: Remember, you deserve your quality time too! What makes you happy?

text_1_facilitator.eng:
Small actions, big results! Parents who practice their module skills at home get better results.

Whenever you can, relax, recognise and reward yourself.

Care for yourself every day. You matter!

media_title.eng:
Hear a teen's testimonial

PLACEHOLDER TEXT NEED ANNA

media_transcript.eng:
My dad was always busy. He would come home from work and snap at us when we started asking him questions.

ParentApp helped us a lot. We no longer fight. Now, when my dad comes home, he first sits down by himself for 5 minutes and then we do a relaxing activity from ParentApp together, so we can all take a deep breath and relax. Then we can chat about our day, about anything good or bad that happened. Everyone is so much happier now.

rows.media_transcript:
My dad was always busy. He would come home from work and snap at us when we started asking him questions.

ParentApp helped us a lot. We no longer fight. Now, when my dad comes home, he first sits down by himself for 5 minutes and then we do a relaxing activity from ParentApp together, so we can all take a deep breath and relax. Then we can chat about our day, about anything good or bad that happened. Everyone is so much happier now.
